scene-display-style.name: Default scene display style
scene-display-style.hint: Whether the media should fit or cover the bounding tile (shift-key to use the non-default display style).

popout-display-mode.name: Default popout sharing mode
popout-display-mode.hint: Whether a popout media should be shared to all players or a selection of players (shift-key to use the non-default sharing mode).

bounding-tile.not-found: No existing bounding tile. Please create a bounding tile on this scene.

display-tile.clear-failed: Display tile already cleared or missing bounding tile.

share.scene-success: Media successfully shared on the scene.

share.popout-success-some: Media successfully shared to selected players.
share.no-scene: No scene viewed. Please display a scene first.

players-selection.title: Which players should the media be shared with?
players-selection.how-to: Please select the players to whom the media will be shared.
